def_cn: (机器、装置等)高级的，精密的;(方法)复杂的
def_en: A sophisticated machine, device, or method is more advanced or complex than others.

def_cn: 善于社交的;高雅时髦的;见过世面的
def_en: Someone who is sophisticated is comfortable in social situations and knows about culture, fashion, and other matters that are considered socially important.

def_cn: 精明老练的;老于世故的
def_en: A sophisticated person is intelligent and knows a lot, so that they are able to understand complicated situations.
